maqras.text: 56|75|Wo bi yi xingsu de moluo chu mengshi,
56|76|zhe que shi yige zhongda de mengshi, jiaruo nimen zhidao.
56|77|Zhe que shi baogui de “gulanjing”,
56|78|jilu zai zhencang de jing ben zhong,
56|79|zhiyou chunjie zhe cai de fumo na jing ben.
56|80|“Gulanjing” shi cong quan shijie de zhu jiang shi de.
56|81|Nandao nimen miaoshi zhe xun ci,
56|82|er yi fouren daiti ganxie ma?
56|83|(Nimen) zenme buzai linghun dao jiang sizhe de yanhou de shihou
56|84|na shihou, nimen dajia kanzhe ta,
56|85|wo bi nimen geng linjin ta, dan nimen bu xiaode,
56|86|ruguo nimen bushi shou baoying de,
56|87|nimen zen bu shi linghun fu fan yu benwei ne? Ruguo nimen shi shuo shihua de.
56|88|Ruguo ta shi bei juangu de,
56|89|name, ta jiang xiangshou shushi, jiyang yu enze de leyuan;
56|90|ruguo ta shi xingfu zhe,
56|91|name, yiban xingfu de ren jiang dui ta shuo: Zhu ni ping'an!
56|92|Ruguo ta shi mi wu de, fouren fuhuo zhe,
56|93|name, ta jiang xiangshou feishui de kuandai,
56|94|he liehuo de shaozhuo.
56|95|Zhe que shi wu ke zhiyi de zhenli.
56|96|Gu ni yingdang songyang ni de zhu de daming.
57|1|Tiandi wanwu, dou zansong an la chaojue wanwu, ta que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi rui de.
57|2|Tiandi de guo quan, gui tasuoyou; ta neng shi rensheng, neng shi ren si; ta duiyu wanshi, shi quanneng de.
57|3|Ta shi qian wu shi hou wu zhong de, shi ji xianzhu ji yin wei de, ta shi quanzhi wanwu de.

57|4|Ta shi zai liu rinei chuangzao tiandi, ranhou sheng shang baozuo de. Ta zhidao qianru di zhong de, he cong di zhong shengchu de, yu cong tiankong jiangxia de, he sheng shang tiankong de. Wulun nimen zai nali, ta shi yu nimen tong zai de; ta shi jian cha nimen de xingwei de.
57|5|Tiandi de guo quan, gui ta suoyou; wanshi zhi guiyu an la.
57|6|Ta shi heiye qinru baizhou, shi baizhou qinru heiye; ta shi quanzhi xinshi de.
57|7|Nimen yingdang xinyang an la he shizhe, nimen yingdang fen she ta suo wei nimen dai guan de caichan, nimen zhong xindao erqie shishe zhe, jiang shou zhongda de baochou.
57|8|Nimen zenme bu xinyang an la ni? Shizhe haozhao nimen qu xinyang nimen de zhu, er nimen de zhu, que yi he nimen diyue, ruguo nimen shi xinshi di hua.,,,,
57|9|Ta jiang shi ta de puren xuduo mingzheng, yibian ta shi nimen cong chongchong hei'an zou ru guangming. An la duiyu nimen, que shi ren'ai de, que shi zhi ci de.

57|10|Nimen zenme bu wei an la er shishe ne? Tiandi de yichan, zhishi an la de. Nimen zhong zai shengli zhiqian shishe erqie canzhan zhe, yu zai shengli zhihou shishe erqie canzhan zhe, bushi pingdeng de, qianzhe bi hou zhe pinji geng gao. An la yi zui you de baochou yingxu mei pai ren, an la shi che zhi nimen de xingwei de.
57|11|Shei yi shan zhai jie gei an la ni? An la jiang jiabei changhuan ta, ta hai shou youhou de baochou.

57|12|Zai na ri, ni jiang kanjian nannu xinshimen, tamen de guanghui, zai tamen de qianmian he youbian benchi, youren jiang dui tamen shuo: Nimen jinri de jiayin, shi xia lin zhu he de leyuan; nimen jiang yong ju qizhong, na que shi weida de chenggong.

57|13|Zai na ri, wei xin de nannu, jiang dui xindao de nannu shuo: Qing nimen denghou women, rang women jie nimen de yidian guanghui! Youren jiangyao dui tamen shuo: Nimen zhuan huiqu xunqiu guanghui ba! Yushi, bici zhi jian, zhu qile yi du gebi lai, gebi shang youyidaomen, men nei you enhui, men wai you xingfa.

57|14|Tamen jiang hanjiao xindao de renmen shuo: Nandao women yu nimen bushi tong jiao ma? Tamen shuo: Buran, nimen zi qi, guanwang, huaiyi zhengdao, zhongzhong wangxiang qipian nimen, zhidao an la de mingling lailin, hua zei ceng yi an la de yourong qipian nimen.
57|15|Gu jinri nimen yu bu xindao zhe de fajin, dou bu bei jieshou, nimen de guisu shi huo yu, na duiyu nimen shi geng xiangyi de, na guisu zhen elie!
